questions.question: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?

answers.answer: If I had 1 millions euros, depending on how i would have got it, I would spend it in different ways.

If I had earned it with my work, I think I would use it a little everyday to do wathever I want to do, because it means that my work is going well and that I don't really have to worry about money. But if I had won it, I would deffenitely spare it, to be sure that if I have a problem I can get over it.
